price: و آنان [= اصحاب کهف] سیصد سال در غار‌شان [در حالت خواب] ماندند و نُه سال [نیز] بر آن افزودند.
arabic: وَلَبِثُواْ فِي كَهۡفِهِمۡ ثَلَٰثَ مِاْئَةٖ سِنِينَ وَٱزۡدَادُواْ تِسۡعٗا

version.title: Persian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Persian by the team of the Persian language in Rowwad Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walabithū fī kahfihim thalātha mi-atin sinīna wa-iz'dādū tis'ʿan
